name: CIPHERCLOUD [Content - Shared Link Removed]
description: This rule looks for CipherCloud events on removal of a shared link in the content.

name: CIPHERCLOUD [Content - Deleted]
description: This rule looks for CipherCloud events on content deletion.

name: CIPHERCLOUD [Content - Quarantined]
description: This rule looks for CipherCloud events on content being quarantined.

name: CIPHERCLOUD [Content - Remediate]
description: This rule looks for CipherCloud events on content being remediated.

name: CIPHERCLOUD [Content - Denied]
description: This rule looks for CipherCloud events on content being denied.
